text:
From my notes: (failed to add update source relates to the 0x8007000d error) 
C:\Windows\System32\GroupPolicy\Machine 
Rename the Registry.pol file 
Then re-run the Software Updates Scan Cycle in the Configmgr Actions tab. 
Cynthia Erno
%40SA0PR09MB7116.namprd09.prod.outlook.com
